name: MetaMorph
description: MetaMorph help companies transform their identities and become employers of choice by creating a strong employer brand externally and building culture internally. From startups at a pre-series stage to teams of over 2000 professionals, we have built employer identities for a vast range of startups in the ecosystem. With MetaMorph, we give you end-to-end expertise. From finding the right people and teams for your organisation and helping you upskill your employees to transforming your employer brand and fuelling your decisions with data, we have you covered – 360°.
features: How do startups and unicorns reach new heights? Through their people. From CXOs to young talent, we can be the core partners in helping you find the people who fuel your growth.
Through your identity, you become the employer of choice for the best talent out there. We create your employer brand externally, and aid you in transforming your culture, internally.
Make data driven decisions from salary benchmarking reports, brand perception analysis and more through our large scale research projects, that give you in-depth industry insights.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Helping people power growth.
ShortDescription: MetaMorph is help startups scale, evolve their strategies and create path-breaking products by placing people at the helm.

Highlights.name: Acquisition
Highlights.description: Servify is a global product lifecycle management platform that brings together every ecosystem partner to deliver happiness to the consumer.

Highlights.name: How to set up a Performance Management System
Highlights.description: Keeping your employees motivated and making sure they’re able to perform at their best is crucial for an employer. This is where Performance Management can be a powerful tool to …

Highlights.name: Employee Stint Analysis
Highlights.description: In an ecosystem like the Indian startup where people have a plethora of opportunities to explore, companies are facing a constant battle to attract and retain exceptional talent. It’s crucial for organisations to focus on creating a stellar employee experience.

enhanced_description: MetaMorph offers end-to-end HR expertise to companies ranging from pre-series stage startups to large enterprises with over 2000 professionals. Specializing in helping organizations become employers of choice, MetaMorph builds strong external employer brands and transforms internal culture. Their services include comprehensive talent acquisition, from sourcing CXOs to young talent, and providing staffing services. MetaMorph also supports employee upskilling and advises on setting up Performance Management Systems. They fuel strategic HR decisions with data-driven insights derived from large-scale research projects, including salary benchmarking reports and brand perception analysis. Additionally, they provide insights into employee experience and retention through analyses like Employee Stint Analysis.
key_use_cases: Talent acquisition and staffing (including CXOs and young talent)
Employee experience and retention analysis (e.g., Employee Stint Analysis)
competitive_advantages: Specialization in employer brand creation and internal culture transformation
Data-driven insights through large-scale research projects (salary benchmarking, brand perception)
Ability to source diverse talent (CXOs to young professionals)
roi_benefits: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
